core:process.core:name: Tender
core:process.core:comment: Handle Total Pressed event to move to Tendering. Also handles payment card swiped event.

core:processNote.core:description: If this fails then continue without Order processing

core:endProcessAction.core:comment: Represents a choice of return to sales or a failure of this process
Process is complete, basket balance is zero.

core:action.core:comment: Safety check that basket savings processing has been run when we get here

core:assignAction.core:comment: If input current event is a card data event, save it in state. Discard current event.

core:state.core:comment: This state is needed to ensure that we are not running Tendering in the state we return to when we cancel or fail.
